titleStmt.title: The hierarchie of the blessed angells Their names, orders and offices the fall of Lucifer with his angells written by Tho: Heywood
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
Cecil, Thomas, fl. 1630, engraver.

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed: T Cecill sculp:.
With four final contents leaves; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
